posts.text: I interviewed at Google for SWE role in 2024. They asked about React, Node.js, and system design. The coding round was tough. I passed!
Amazon interview - asked about React, Python, and Docker. System design on AWS was challenging. Got the offer in 2024!
Google SDE interview in 2025. Questions on React, Kubernetes, Machine Learning, and LLM. Very different from last year. Got offer!
Meta 2025 interview - heavy focus on ML and AI. Asked about transformers, LLMs, and RAG systems. Passed all rounds!
